actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 2:00 p.m. on June 30, 2023.

actions-list.header: Board of Trustees of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 2(a) of the National Cultural Center Act (20 U.S.C. 76h(a)), amended by Public Law 107-117, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following member of the House to the Board of Trustees of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts: Mrs. Beatty.

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U. S. House of Representatives, the Deputy Clerk notified the House that he had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on June 26, 2023, at 2:33 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 111, S. 206, S. 264, S. 349, S. 829, S. 1549, and H.R. 1734, as amended.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Jounral of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Warren Davidson to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
